name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Lens Image Search - Search What You See

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Lens For Pc, Mac and Windows Will help you to search and detect images pattern and download with single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Google Lens Image Search - Search What You See extension is a user-friendly tool that lets you search for images directly from your browser. With just one click, you can discover more about images, identify patterns, and download them effortlessly. This extension supports popular image search engines like Google Lens, Bing, Yandex, and TinEye, making it easy to explore and gather information, whether you're identifying objects, tracing the source of an image, or finding similar pictures.

ðŸ”´ Extension Features:

âœ”    Context Menu Integration: Right-click on any image to instantly search it using Google Lens, Bing, Yandex, or TinEye.

âœ”    Image Analysis: Utilize the power of OpenAI to gain detailed insights and analysis of images.

âœ”    Download Images: Download any image directly from your browser with just a click.

âœ”    Webcam Capture: Capture images using your webcam and perform searches or analysis right on the spot.

âœ”    Custom Actions: Additional context menu options, including Google Lens Detector and custom search actions, enhance your browsing experience.

âœ”    Cross-Browser Compatibility: Works seamlessly across all major platforms, including PC, Mac, and Windows.
ðŸ”´ Why Use This Extension:

The Google Lens Image Search extension makes it incredibly easy to search, analyze, and download images without leaving your browser. It offers multiple search options, allowing you to choose what works best for your needs. Plus, with advanced AI technology, you can gain deeper insights into the images you explore. The extension is simple, intuitive, and integrates perfectly into your everyday browsing experience.

ðŸ”´ How to Use This Extension:

To get started, install the Google Lens Image Search extension from the Chrome Web Store. Once installed, simply right-click on any image while browsing to search it using your preferred search engine. You can also use the webcam feature to capture a photo and search or analyze it instantly. If you wish to save an image, just right-click and select 'Download Image.' For more detailed analysis, use the Google Lens Detector.
